name: Product Vision Ad-Lib Template (Chatbot or Voicebot Design)
description:
Explain the product vision with an actionable statement. This ad-lib template introduces questions to help you generate ideas.


It explores the customer segment, problem, key features, needs, and metrics, and helps you to brainstorm on those components.


The main goal of using something like this is to come up with a single and actionable statement that would help to explain the team's vision.


It's great to use during alignment sessions, brainstorming sessions, workshops, product reviews, and more!


Built to give back to the community. ✌️

Please share any feedback to hello@caiocalado.com
